title: pOTruvEn padam
sahitya:
pOTruvEn padam unadai pAmAlai punaindu nAn sATruvEn pugazh mAlai sAmimalai vITravanE


anupallavi

  Etramun enakku Atral nIyaLikka ihaparam iraNDilum sukhamuTruk-kaLikkavE


caraNam    AtroNAt-tuyaram aghanru avadhiyurAdu aruL mAri pozhiyum aruL kUrum ayyanE
mATram urAda ezhilin tOTramuDan tigazhum mAmayil vITriDum sAminAtha sImAnE
